title:
On a recent visit to Wilmington my husband and I were walking down toward the river after visiting the Cotton Exchange.  There was a large fenced in area and the fence was covered with keys...hundreds and hundreds of them.  I would love to know the significance of this. It might have been Chestnut Street but I\'m not sure.  Any ideas?

Thank you.

Marie Gill
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20091223/ARTICLES/912239986
